channel.title: Client uid Requirment Fixes
channel.description:
a problem yet fixed with pissing people off as you might know you can decompile justabout any client for example Mine.. it has a uid in it and if you would get that you could take it and put it into a hacking client but way to fix.... Example
public static int KILLERSCAPEUIID = 3-245-34-65-236-A-U-134-2-542-5-25-23423+23423-23423-23 423+23423525*23-234234+234234-A-U-U-U-A-2352-A-U-413432 +1352542-245245+3-245-34-65-236-A-U-134-2-542-5-25-2342 3+23423-23423-23423+23423525*23;
And this is a trick i learned just put this in random places but first decare it public static int U = 2523; public static int A = 25424; but thats not the real varible put this in random load up spots Change the number on each one... U = 24525253; A = 234534; Try to hide them the best way posible and make shure your client ONLY connects to your server Then Server side (finding the uid) put this in your login trial system.out.println(""+uid+""); Then copy it and paste it for your client requerment

item.title: Client uid Requirment Fixes
item.dc:creator: @Killer-99-pkz Killer-99-pkz
item.description:
@Killer-99-pkz wrote:

a problem yet fixed with pissing people off

as you might know you can decompile justabout any client for example Mine… it has a uid in it and if you would get that you could take it and put it into a hacking client but way to fix…

Example

public static int KILLERSCAPEUIID = 3-245-34-65-236-A-U-134-2-542-5-25-23423+23423-23423-23

423+23423525*23-234234+234234-A-U-U-U-A-2352-A-U-413432

+1352542-245245+3-245-34-65-236-A-U-134-2-542-5-25-2342

3+23423-23423-23423+23423525*23;

And this is a trick i learned just put this in random places but first decare it

public static int U = 2523;
public static int A = 25424;

but thats not the real varible put this in random load up spots Change the number on each one…

U = 24525253;

A = 234534;

Try to hide them the best way posible and make shure your client ONLY connects to your server

Then Server side (finding the uid)

put this in your login trial

system.out.println(""+uid+"");

Then copy it and paste it for your client requerment

Read full topic
